components.name: Editor Core
components.description: The main component responsible for code editing, syntax highlighting, and basic functionalities.

components.name: Extension Host
components.description: A separate process that runs extensions to enhance the editor's capabilities without blocking the main UI thread.

components.name: Language Server Protocol (LSP)
components.description: A protocol used to provide language-specific features such as autocompletion and error checking through language servers.

components.name: Debug Adapter
components.description: Handles debugging sessions and communicates with the editor to provide debugging features.

data_flows.description: The Editor Core sends user commands and events to the Extension Host to trigger extension functionalities.
The Extension Host communicates with language servers to fetch language-specific features and data.
The Debug Adapter sends debugging information and control commands back to the Editor Core for user interaction.

trust_boundaries.name: User Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's local environment and the application components.

trust_boundaries.name: External Services
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the application and external language servers or debugging services.
